item.description:
We will be meeting in Wellesley this night to watch The Matrix Reloaded with the commentary of Ken Wilber and Cornel West.

This event will be in Lauren's home in Wellesley. RSVP's are necessary. If you need help with transportation, let me know; carpools and T-pickups can be arranged.

If you've not yet seen the Matrix Reloaded you may wish to watch it first on your own, as this viewing will include the continuous commentary during the film.

For more information, see http://integralnaked....
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group February Meetup
